story.iWant: to observe cognitive patterns in conversation
story.soThat: I can adapt my communication style appropriately

assumptions: Reminiscence is a valuable mode of engagement for older adults
Drawing on past experiences enriches conversation
Cognitive patterns inform appropriate conversation approaches

acceptanceCriteria.title: Reminiscence Mode Assessment
acceptanceCriteria.given: The person engages in extended conversation
acceptanceCriteria.when: They draw on memories and past experiences
acceptanceCriteria.then: Assess whether they are in reminiscence mode

parameters.name: Reminiscence Mode
parameters.description: Whether the person is in a mood to share memories and life experiences

interpretationScale.label: Present-Focused
interpretationScale.implication: Focused on present/future, not drawing on past experiences

interpretationScale.label: Balanced
interpretationScale.implication: Mix of present focus and past reflection

interpretationScale.label: Reminiscence Mode
interpretationScale.implication: Sharing stories, reflecting on past, connecting present to history

promptGuidance.whenHigh: Person is in reminiscence mode. Encourage story-sharing, ask about the past, enjoy their memories with them.
promptGuidance.whenLow: Person is present-focused. Discuss current events, practical matters, or future plans.

triggers.name: Cognitive Assessment
triggers.given: The person engages in extended conversation
triggers.then: Note patterns to inform communication adaptation

actions.description: Assess reminiscence mode: Is the person drawing on memories and past experiences?

constraints.description: Observe patterns without making assumptions or judgments
